= XProc Examples =


== p:identity step ==

{{{

xquery version "1.0" encoding "UTF-8";

import module namespace xproc = "http://xproc.net/xproc";

let $stdin := <test>Hello World</test>

let $pipeline := <p:pipeline xmlns:p="http://www.w3.org/ns/xproc" name="pipeline">
                        <p:identity name="test"/>
                    </p:pipeline>
return
      xproc:run($pipeline,$stdin) 

}}}
